title: Data Import Failure
description: A customer's CSV file import is failing with a cryptic error message.

tasks.description: Request the CSV file from the customer to examine it.
Analyze the file and discover it contains incorrect character encoding (UTF-16 instead of UTF-8).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the root cause.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer on how to re-save the file with the correct UTF-8 encoding and try the import again.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear solution that resolves the customer's issue.
